casebody.data:
COUNTY OF DURHAM
v.
AREC 3, LLC, et al. No. 427P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 8, 2007. Jay Ferguson, Durham, Richard Bydee, for AREC 3, LLC. Marie Inserra, for County of Durham. Richard Weintraub, for City of Durham.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of August 2007 by Petitioner (Worth L. Hill, Sheriff of Durham County) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of October 2007."
